\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 65672}

\subsection*{Adderall In Verse}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Rachel}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 60 mg &  & Amphetamines & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 120.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Adderall has taken away my soul

I felt so brilliant at first

Capable of anything

I could just go 

and go

and do 

so much 

people were envious of me

because I never stopped

never crashed

ever

And my drive

my drive

I had such discipline

I was strong

focused 

dedicated

confident

and I was so 

so 

so 

alive

everything that came out of me was golden

Crisp.

Clean.

Sharp.

Perfect.

I felt success

It was coming

out of my pores

surrounding everything I did

I was absolutely glowing.



But now I'm just numb

Stuck

Hollow

I can't finish a feeling

My thoughts stop and start

and I don't really remember who I am

anymore.

\end{document}
